data.title: Dulkar Salmaan Biography: Age, Net Worth, Instagram, Spouse, Height, Wiki, Parents, Siblings, Movies, Awards
data.meta_description: gpt3]Summarize this content to 100 words: Dulkar Salmaan is a talented Indian actor, dubbing singer and filmmaker who has made a significant impact on the Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu and Hindi film industries. He has won the love of audiences across the country with his diverse acting skills and charming screen image. contour Full name: Dulkar Salman Date of Birth: July 28, 1983 Age: 40 Sex: Male Birthplace: Cochin, Kerala, India Nationality: India Occupation: Actor, voice-over singer, film producer Height: 5 feet 9 inches (175 cm) Parents: Mammootty (father), Sulfath (mother) Siblings: Surumi (older sister) Spouse: Amal Sofia Children: Maryam Amira Salman Marital status: Married Net worth: $25 million Early life and education Dulkar Salman, 37, was born on July 28, 1986 in Kochi, Kerala, India. He is the youngest son of legendary actors Mammootty and Surfath. Salman grew up in a family with strong film roots. His father is a famous actor and his mother is a housewife. He also has an elder sister named Surumi. Salman completed his primary education at Toc H Public School, Vedila, Kochi and later moved to Chennai for higher education. He graduated from Purdue University, USA with a Bachelor of Business Administration. After completing his studies, Salman worked briefly as a business manager in Dubai before pursuing an acting career. personal life Dulkar Salman is married to architect Amal Sofia, whom he met through a mutual friend. They tied the knot in a private ceremony in Chennai on January 22, 2011. They have one daughter, Maryam Amyra Salman, who was born on May 5, 2017. Salman is known for his simplicity and unpretentiousness. He often appears at public events without security or entourage. He is a devoted husband and father who often shares good moments with his family on social media. Profession Dulkar Salman began his acting career with the 2012 Malayalam film Show 2, which received critical acclaim. He subsequently starred in several successful films, including Hotel Ustad (2012), ABCD: American Born Confused Indian (2013) and Bangalore Days (2014). Salman has since expanded his portfolio to Tamil, Telugu and Hindi films, working with renowned directors and actors. Some of his notable films include Mani Ratnam’s “O Kadhal Kanmani” (2015), Rajeev Ravi’s “Kammatipaadam” (2016) and Bejoy Nambiar’s “Solo” (2017). Apart from acting, Salman has also ventured into filmmaking, founding the production company Wayfarer Films. He has produced several films, including the critically acclaimed Mahanati (2018). Awards Film Awards Best New Actor Award Filmfare Award for Best Actor (Malayalam) for "Bangalore Days" O Kadhal Kanmani won the Filmfare Award for Best Actor (Tamil) Kerala State Film Award for Best Actor (Kammatipaadam) net worth Dulkar Salmaan's net worth is estimated to be around $25 million, earned through his successful acting career, filmmaking career, and brand endorsements. dispute Salman has been involved in several controversies, including a public spat with actor Sunny Wayne on social media and a legal battle with a filmmaker over a project. But his public image has always been clean and there have been no major scandals. social media Instagram: @dulquersalmaan Twitter: @dulquersalmaan Filmography second round Ustad Hotel ABCD: American-born confused Indians Bangalore Day Okadarkanmani Kamathipadan solo Mahanadi Olu Yamandan Premakhada Kurup [/gpt3]
data.text:
Dulkar Salmaan is a talented Indian actor, dubbing singer and filmmaker who has made a significant impact on the Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu and Hindi film industries.

He has won the love of audiences across the country with his diverse acting skills and charming screen image.

You are watching: Dulkar Salmaan Biography: Age, Net Worth, Instagram, Spouse, Height, Wiki, Parents, Siblings, Movies, Awards

contour

Full name: Dulkar Salman

Date of Birth: July 28, 1983

Age: 40

Sex: Male

Birthplace: Cochin, Kerala, India

Nationality: India

Occupation: Actor, voice-over singer, film producer

Height: 5 feet 9 inches (175 cm)

Parents: Mammootty (father), Sulfath (mother)

Siblings: Surumi (older sister)

Spouse: Amal Sofia

Children: Maryam Amira Salman

Marital status: Married

Net worth: $25 million

Early life and education

Dulkar Salman, 37, was born on July 28, 1986 in Kochi, Kerala, India. He is the youngest son of legendary actors Mammootty and Surfath.

Salman grew up in a family with strong film roots. His father is a famous actor and his mother is a housewife. He also has an elder sister named Surumi.

Salman completed his primary education at Toc H Public School, Vedila, Kochi and later moved to Chennai for higher education. He graduated from Purdue University, USA with a Bachelor of Business Administration.

See more : Ryan Abe Biography: Age, Height, Net Worth, YouTube, Girlfriend

After completing his studies, Salman worked briefly as a business manager in Dubai before pursuing an acting career.

personal life

Dulkar Salman is married to architect Amal Sofia, whom he met through a mutual friend. They tied the knot in a private ceremony in Chennai on January 22, 2011. They have one daughter, Maryam Amyra Salman, who was born on May 5, 2017.

Salman is known for his simplicity and unpretentiousness. He often appears at public events without security or entourage. He is a devoted husband and father who often shares good moments with his family on social media.

Profession

Dulkar Salman began his acting career with the 2012 Malayalam film Show 2, which received critical acclaim. He subsequently starred in several successful films, including Hotel Ustad (2012), ABCD: American Born Confused Indian (2013) and Bangalore Days (2014).

Salman has since expanded his portfolio to Tamil, Telugu and Hindi films, working with renowned directors and actors. Some of his notable films include Mani Ratnam’s “O Kadhal Kanmani” (2015), Rajeev Ravi’s “Kammatipaadam” (2016) and Bejoy Nambiar’s “Solo” (2017).

See more : Tate McCree’s Mother Tanja Rosner Biography: Children, Age, Net Worth, Husband, Height, Wikipedia

Apart from acting, Salman has also ventured into filmmaking, founding the production company Wayfarer Films. He has produced several films, including the critically acclaimed Mahanati (2018).

Awards

Film Awards Best New Actor Award

Filmfare Award for Best Actor (Malayalam) for “Bangalore Days”

O Kadhal Kanmani won the Filmfare Award for Best Actor (Tamil)

Kerala State Film Award for Best Actor (Kammatipaadam)

net worth

Dulkar Salmaan’s net worth is estimated to be around $25 million, earned through his successful acting career, filmmaking career, and brand endorsements.

dispute

Salman has been involved in several controversies, including a public spat with actor Sunny Wayne on social media and a legal battle with a filmmaker over a project.

But his public image has always been clean and there have been no major scandals.

social media

Twitter: @dulquersalmaan
